block.title: Slack Incoming Webhook
block.text: This alert action uses Slack's Incoming Webhooks to post messages from Splunk into Slack channels. You can set a default webhook URL here, which will be used for all alerts be default. Each alert can override and use a different webhook URL that has different permissions or can send to a different Slack workspace.
Configure Slack incoming webhook (opens in new window)

block.title: Message Appearance
block.text: This name will appear in slack as the user sending the message.
The avatar/icon shown by the sender of the slack message. This URL needs to be accessible from the internet.
